title: Display customer details above new door entry form

requirements.summary: Display read-only customer details section above DoorEntryForm in the main door entry view
acceptanceCriteria: The customer name and mobile number collected on the CustomerInfoForm screen are visible above the DoorEntryForm on the form view.
The customer details section is read-only (not editable inline).
The section is styled consistently with the existing amber/stone warm neutral theme.
The customer details section remains visible while the user adds door entries.

file_operations.description: In the 'form' view section of App.tsx (where currentView === 'form'), add a customer details display component or section above the DoorEntryForm component. Pass customerName and customerMobile from state as props to display them read-only. Style the section using Card from shadcn/ui with consistent amber/stone theme spacing and typography. Ensure this section remains visible throughout the door entry process without interfering with the existing three-view navigation logic (customerInfo → form → quotation).
